implementation.name: EventList
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Displays a list of events, provides UI for editing, deleting, and creating events. Calls backend endpoints via props or inline API calls.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Render a list of events
For each event:
    Display event details
    Provide Edit and Delete buttons
Provide a button to create a new event
On Edit/Delete/Create, call corresponding handler functions

implementation.name: EventCard
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Displays individual event details, provides UI for editing and deleting a single event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive event data as props
Display event name, description, start date, end date
Provide Edit and Delete buttons
On Edit/Delete, call handler functions passed via props

implementation.name: EventForm
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Provides a form for creating or editing an event, collects event name, description, start date, and end date.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Render input fields for event name, description, start date, end date
On submit:
    Validate input
    Call API to create or update event
    On success, notify parent component

implementation.name: create_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for creating a new event. Receives event data from frontend, calls service to create event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive POST request with event data
Call EventService.create_event with event data
Return created event response

implementation.name: get_all_events
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for retrieving all events. Used by frontend to display event list.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive GET request
Call EventService.get_all_events
Return list of event responses

implementation.name: get_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for retrieving a single event by ID. Used for viewing or editing event details.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive GET request with event_id
Call EventService.get_event with event_id
Return event response

implementation.name: update_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for updating an event. Receives updated event data from frontend.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive PUT request with event_id and updated event data
Call EventService.update_event with event_id and event data
Return updated event response

implementation.name: delete_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for deleting an event. Called from frontend when user deletes an event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive DELETE request with event_id
Call EventService.delete_event with event_id
Return success status

implementation.name: create_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Service function called by create_event endpoint. Handles business logic and validation for event creation.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Validate event dates
Create Event object
Call EventRepository.create to save event
Return EventResponse

implementation.name: get_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Service function called by get_event endpoint. Retrieves event by ID.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Call EventRepository.get_by_id with event_id
Return EventResponse

implementation.name: get_all_events
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Service function called by get_all_events endpoint. Retrieves all events.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Call EventRepository.get_all
Return list of EventResponse

implementation.name: update_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Service function called by update_event endpoint. Handles business logic for updating event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Retrieve event by ID
Update event fields
Call EventRepository.update
Return EventResponse

implementation.name: delete_event
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Service function called by delete_event endpoint. Handles business logic for deleting event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Retrieve event by ID
Call EventRepository.delete
Return None

implementation.name: create
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Repository function called by service to persist new event in database.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Add event to database session
Commit transaction
Return event

implementation.name: get_by_id
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Repository function called by service to retrieve event by ID.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Query database for event with given ID
Return event or None

implementation.name: get_all
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Repository function called by service to retrieve all events.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Query database for all events
Return list of events

implementation.name: update
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Repository function called by service to update event in database.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Commit transaction
Return updated event

implementation.name: delete
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Repository function called by service to delete event from database.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Delete event from database session
Commit transaction

implementation.name: TaskList
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Displays a list of tasks, provides UI for creating, editing, and deleting tasks. Calls API functions to fetch, create, update, and delete tasks.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Render a list of TaskCard components for each task
Provide buttons for editing, deleting, and creating tasks
On user action, call corresponding API functions and update UI

implementation.name: TaskCard
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Displays individual task details including title, description, and status. Provides edit and delete buttons.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Display task title, description, and status
Show edit and delete buttons
On button click, call onEdit or onDelete handler

implementation.name: TaskForm
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Form for creating or editing a task. Handles input for title, description, status, and submits to API.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Render input fields for title, description, status
On submit, call onSuccess handler with form data
On close, call onClose handler

implementation.name: getTasks
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Fetches all tasks from the backend API, optionally filtered by event ID.
implementation.pseudo_code:
If eventId is provided, set params with event_id
Send GET request to /tasks endpoint with params
Return response data (list of tasks)

implementation.name: getTask
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Fetches a single task by ID from the backend API.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Send GET request to /tasks/{id} endpoint
Return response data (task details)

implementation.name: createTask
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Sends a POST request to create a new task with title, description, status.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Send POST request to /tasks endpoint with task data
Return response data (created task)

implementation.name: updateTask
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Sends a PUT request to update an existing task's title, description, or status.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Send PUT request to /tasks/{id} endpoint with updated task data
Return response data (updated task)

implementation.name: deleteTask
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Sends a DELETE request to remove a task by ID.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Send DELETE request to /tasks/{id} endpoint
No response data needed

implementation.name: create_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for creating a new task. Receives task data, calls TaskService.create_task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive POST request with task data
Instantiate TaskService
Call create_task with provided data
Return created task response

implementation.name: get_all_tasks
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for fetching all tasks, optionally filtered by event ID. Calls TaskService.get_all_tasks.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive GET request, optionally with event_id
Instantiate TaskService
Call get_all_tasks with event_id
Return list of task responses

implementation.name: get_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for fetching a single task by ID. Calls TaskService.get_task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive GET request with task_id
Instantiate TaskService
Call get_task with task_id
Return task response

implementation.name: update_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for updating a task by ID. Calls TaskService.update_task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive PUT request with task_id and updated data
Instantiate TaskService
Call update_task with task_id and data
Return updated task response

implementation.name: delete_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint for deleting a task by ID. Calls TaskService.delete_task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Receive DELETE request with task_id
Instantiate TaskService
Call delete_task with task_id
Return no content

implementation.name: TaskService.create_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Business logic for creating a task. Validates event, calls repository to create task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Validate event exists
Create Task object from data
Call repository.create to save task
Return TaskResponse

implementation.name: TaskService.get_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Business logic for fetching a single task by ID. Calls repository to get task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Call repository.get_by_id with task_id
Return TaskResponse

implementation.name: TaskService.get_all_tasks
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Business logic for fetching all tasks, optionally filtered by event ID. Calls repository to get tasks.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Call repository.get_all with event_id
Return list of TaskResponse

implementation.name: TaskService.update_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Business logic for updating a task. Fetches task, updates fields, calls repository to save.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Call repository.get_by_id with task_id
Update task fields with new data
Call repository.update to save changes
Return TaskResponse

implementation.name: TaskService.delete_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Business logic for deleting a task. Fetches task, calls repository to delete.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Call repository.get_by_id with task_id
Call repository.delete to remove task

implementation.name: TaskRepository.create
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Database operation to add a new task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Add task to database session
Commit transaction
Return created task

implementation.name: TaskRepository.get_by_id
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Database operation to fetch a task by ID.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Query database for Task with given ID
Return Task or None

implementation.name: TaskRepository.get_all
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Database operation to fetch all tasks, optionally filtered by event ID.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Query database for all Task objects
If event_id is provided, filter by event_id
Return list of Task

implementation.name: TaskRepository.update
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Database operation to update a task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Commit changes to database
Return updated task

implementation.name: TaskRepository.delete
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Database operation to delete a task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Delete task from database session
Commit transaction

implementation.name: create_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint to create a new task, requiring an event_id to associate the task with an event. Validates event existence.
implementation.pseudo_code:
When a POST request is made to /tasks:
  - Extract task data including event_id
  - Call TaskService.create_task with the data
  - Return the created task

implementation.name: TaskService.create_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles business logic for creating a task, ensures the event exists, and associates the task with exactly one event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Given TaskCreate data:
  - Check if event with event_id exists
    - If not, raise error
  - Create Task object with event_id
  - Save task via TaskRepository.create
  - Return TaskResponse

implementation.name: get_all_tasks
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint to retrieve all tasks, optionally filtered by event_id to view tasks for a specific event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
When a GET request is made to /tasks:
  - If event_id is provided, filter tasks by event_id
  - Call TaskService.get_all_tasks
  - Return list of tasks

implementation.name: TaskService.get_all_tasks
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Fetches all tasks, optionally filtered by event_id, enabling viewing all tasks for a specific event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
If event_id is provided:
  - Call TaskRepository.get_all(event_id)
Else:
  - Call TaskRepository.get_all()
Return list of TaskResponse

implementation.name: update_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint to update a task, including reassigning it to a different event by changing event_id.
implementation.pseudo_code:
When a PUT request is made to /tasks/{task_id}:
  - Extract update data (may include new event_id)
  - Call TaskService.update_task
  - Return updated task

implementation.name: TaskService.update_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles updating a task, including reassigning it to a different event. Validates new event existence.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Given task_id and TaskUpdate data:
  - Fetch task by id
    - If not found, raise error
  - If event_id is provided:
    - Check if new event exists
      - If not, raise error
    - Update task.event_id
  - Update other fields
  - Save via TaskRepository.update
  - Return TaskResponse

implementation.name: delete_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: API endpoint to remove a task from its event by deleting the task.
implementation.pseudo_code:
When a DELETE request is made to /tasks/{task_id}:
  - Call TaskService.delete_task
  - Return no content

implementation.name: TaskService.delete_task
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles deletion of a task, effectively removing it from its associated event.
implementation.pseudo_code:
Given task_id:
  - Fetch task by id
    - If not found, raise error
  - Delete task via TaskRepository.delete
